rules.condition: len([pair for pair in transaction['offering']['currencyPairs'] if pair['payin']['kind'] == 'USD_LEDGER' and float(pair['payin']['amount']) > 300]) > 0
rules.message: Payin amount from USD_LEDGER is too high

rules.condition: len([pair for pair in transaction['offering']['currencyPairs'] if pair['estimatedSettlementTime'] > 10]) > 0
rules.message: Estimated settlement time is too long

rules.condition: len([pair for pair in transaction['offering']['currencyPairs'] if not pair['payout']['paymentDetails'].get('reason')]) > 0
rules.message: Payout reason is missing or empty

rules.condition: len([tx for tx in history[1:] if tx['quote']['data']['expiresAt'] > (datetime.now() - relativedelta(months=3)).isoformat()]) > 3
rules.message: More than 3 transactions in the past 3 months

rules.condition: len([pair for pair in transaction['offering']['currencyPairs'] if float(pair['payin']['amount']) > 1000]) > 0 and (datetime.now() - datetime.fromisoformat(transaction['accountCreated'])).days < 30
rules.message: Transaction over 1000 and account is less than one month old
